DataElement.preferredName: Progressive Recurrent Persistent Disease Therapeutic Procedure Since Date Contact Last Report Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not therapeutic procedures were administered for progressive, recurrent or persistent disease since the date of the last report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Progressive Recurrent Persistent Disease Therapeutic Procedure Since Date Contact Last Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity._The return of signs and symptoms of cancer after a period of improvement._Retained; never-ceasing._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Subsequent to; after._a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen._a channel for communication between groups_Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._Report; a short account.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PD Recurrent Disease Persistent Therapeutic Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity.:the return of a sign, symptom, or disease after a remission.:Retained; never-ceasing.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
Retained; never-ceasing.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Subsequent to; after.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.:a channel for communication between groups:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: Subsequent to; after.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
a channel for communication between groups
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
